magicPotion.name: Magic Potion
magicPotion.extra:
6 Seconds of Unlimited Spirit. 
 Recovers all broken spirit orbs.

stopwatch.name: Stopwatch
stopwatch.extra: After startup, stops time for 50F. User can move, but not attack.

hakuroken.name: Hakuroken
hakuroken.extra:
[*] Same as character's ground dash. 
Cancels current action into a dash. 
Costs 2 Spirit Orbs to use.
User will not recover spirit for 5 seconds.

grimoire.name: Grimoire
grimoire.extra:
**Default:** 6.0 per second.
**Level 1:** 6.5 per second, additional effect: 0.5 per second. 
**Level 2:** 7.25 per second, additional effect: 0.75 per second.
**Level 3:** 8.16 per second, additional effect: 0.91 per second. 
**Level 4:** 9.25 per second, additional effect: 1.09 per second.

customParasol.name: Custom Parasol
customParasol.extra:
Eats all projectiles level B and below. 
Will eat an unlimited amount of projectiles until it expires.

leftHandedFoldingFan.name: Left-handed Folding Fan
leftHandedFoldingFan.extra:
[*] Character Dependant 
Spirit Damage: 5 Orbs (Crush) 
Frame Adv. on crush is char. dependant. 
 Use `~<char> lhff` for character specifics.

ibukiGourd.name: Ibuki Gourd
ibukiGourd.extra:
1 card is instantly drawn after *startup* finishes. 
Rapidly gains 2nd card gauge over the *duration*. 
If interrupted, ends the gauge fill effect.

tenguFan.name: Tengu Fan
tenguFan.extra:
Gives a flat boost (+0.5*n).
 Affects walk speed, dash speed, and airdash speed. 
 Does not affect flight. 
 Stacks with Tempest.

spellBreakingDrug.name: Spell-Breaking Drug
spellBreakingDrug.extra:
[*] Character Dependant. 
 Hits High, AUB. 
 Use `~<char> Drug` for character specifics.

aPennySaved.name: A Penny Saved
aPennySaved.extra:
Pushes back at a rate of (16-n) dots starting at frame 1. 
(e.g. 15, 14, ..., 1; total of 120 units)
> "Any normal pushback happening from an opponent blocking in corner will override coin pushback, but if that normal pushback ends, coin pushback can resume." -Iron

On use, drains 1 spirit orb and requires [x] time before it can recover. 
1 Coin: 140F of Spirit Recovery Delay 
2 Coins: 120F 
3 Coins: 100F 
4 Coins: 80F

divineRaimentOfTheDragonFish.name: Divine Raiment of the Dragon Fish
divineRaimentOfTheDragonFish.extra:
[*] Character Dependant 
 Invuln: 1-27F 
 Hits High & Airunblockable. 
 Use `~<char> scarf` for specifics.

swordOfScarletPerception.name: Sword of Scarlet Perception
swordOfScarletPerception.extra:
Invuln: 17-60F 
Usage in weather causes it to drain at 7x the normal speed.

illnessRecoveryCharm.name: Illness Recovery Charm
illnessRecoveryCharm.extra:
Recovers 1,000HP over 250F.
Getting hit ends the effect.

frozenFrog.name: Frozen Frog
frozenFrog.extra:
Lasts 10 seconds or being used 3 times. 
 Dashing or Jumping on Ice will cause the players to be knocked down.

dragonStar.name: Dragon Star
dragonStar.extra:
Grants Super Armor for 4 seconds. 1 second is spent on recovery, 3 seconds after actions can be done. 
 Can be broken after three consecutive hits or during hitstun. 
 If the card is still active, the armor will be reinstated.

controlRod.name: Control Rod
controlRod.extra:
**User Attack/Defense Drop:** [+10%\*n/+7.5%\*n] 
**Level 1:** `Self: 9,302 | Opp.: 9,091 | HP Adv.: 211 | Mutual DMG: 698` 
**Level 2:** `Self: 8,696 | Opp.: 8,333 | HP Adv.: 363 | Mutual DMG: 1,304` 
**Level 3:** `Self: 8,163 | Opp.: 7,692 | HP Adv.: 471 | Mutual DMG: 1,837` 
**Level 4:** `Self: 7,692 | Opp.: 7,143 | HP Adv.: 549 | Mutual DMG: 2,308`

threeHeavenlyDrops.name: Three Heavenly Drops
threeHeavenlyDrops.extra:
On third use, grants 8 seconds of Invuln and unlimited Spirit. 
 If a 4th is used during the duration, adds an additional 8 seconds.

catfishGiantEarthquake.name: Catfish's Great Earthquake
catfishGiantEarthquake.extra:
If hit before 13F, does not spawn. 
Hits Low. 
 Deals 1 (2 on wrong block) of Spirit Damage.
